roleset.name: fix

example.name: agentive
example.text: Despite the harsh exchanges , the U.S. and China still seem to be looking for a way to mend relations , which have deteriorated into what Mr. Nixon referred to as `` the greatest crisis in Chinese - American relations '' since his initial visit to China 17 years ago .

propbank.arg: relations , which have deteriorated into what Mr. Nixon referred to as `` the greatest crisis in Chinese - American relations '' since his initial visit to China 17 years ago

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Today , George W. Bush signaled his intention to mend fences with black Americans .

roleset.note: MEND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mend' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from mend.01-v predicate notes)
